00008 #if !defined(Asc_ValueMap_hpp)
00009 #define Asc_ValueMap_hpp
00012 
00013 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00014     This file is used to support value mapping macros to supply the use of 
00015     configuration independent definition of constants and enums.
00016     The values of the so-defined constants and enums are assinged within the
00017     various configuration dependant ValueMap.hpp files.
00018     If a new class-scope is used, then an accordingly configuration independant 
00019     scope macro must be defined.
00020     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00021 
00022 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00023     macros for configuration independent definition of constants and enums.
00024     these macros form the programmer's interface.
00025     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00026 // general macros for configuration independent value definitions
00027 #define ApoxiDefineEntity(val) APOXI_DEFINE_ENTITY_##val
00028 
00029 
00030 // general assignement macro for configuration independent value definitions using a scope qualifier
00031 #define ApoxiDefineScopeEntity(val, scope) APOXI_DEFINE_SCOPE_ENTITY_##scope##_##val
00032 
00033 
00034 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035     configuration dependent ValueMap.hpp's
00036     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00037 #include <Asc/Target/ValueMap.hpp>
00038 
00040 #endif  // Asc_ValueMap_hpp
